turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Jen, can you order a drink at the Starbucks on Sawmill Road?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The Starbucks in Dublin, near the Chipotle?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's the one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What can I order for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a Grande Carmel Macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk would you like in that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could I get it with soy milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you make sure the put the caramel drizzle on it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will do. Will the vanilla syrup be ok? I think that's what it typically comes with.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yea, the vanilla syrup will be good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What time do you want it ready?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I should be able to pick it up in about ten minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Not a problem. Just to confirm, you want a Caramel Macchiato with soy and a caramel drizzle?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's the one!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I will put that order in now to the Starbucks on Sawmill.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome, I am on my way now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They will text the receipt to you so you should be all set.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks, Jen!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your welcome. See you later.
